segments.text: The kitchen seems ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel in hand, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running full, sink overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down to the floor in sheets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it, unaware, expression blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet with the cookie jar tempting the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs the stool, it's leaning back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is long, fingers in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plate in his other hand, clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm extended, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be bad with the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden mocks the indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the potential mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
